EmailTemplate.description: This Template is for GoDirect Feedback Email for case closure.
EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Forge Feedback close case
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Regarding {!Case.CaseNumber}, the issue you reported has now been addressed.
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or need additional support.
